p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; text-align: center; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: inherit; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: block; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;

strong.span: District 4 Schools will be closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year as mandated by the Governor of South Carolina .

span.br:
If you have specific questions, please call your student's school of attendance or the District 4 Administrative Offices.
Administrative Office - (864) 476-3186
Woodruff Primary School - (864) 476-3174
Woodruff Elementary School - (864) 476-3123
Woodruff Middle School (864) 476-3150
Woodruff High School - (864) 476-7045
We thank our Woodruff Community for working together to keep our students and families safe during this health issue.

span.strong: We appreciate your interest in Spartanburg School District Four, a unique community where southern hospitality and friendliness abound.

p.span: "Our district is helping all students develop world class skills and life and career characteristics of the Profile of the South Carolina Graduate by personalizing the educational journeys for students from birth through adult education. Click here to continue reading about our district.

br.br: By visiting our website, we hope you discover that District Four is a very special place. Please contact us if you need additional information.
